com.sun.jndi.ldap
Class BasicControl

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.sun.jndi.ldap.BasicControl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Control, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DirSyncControl, DirSyncResponseControl, EntryChangeResponseControl, ManageReferralControl, PagedResultsControl, PagedResultsResponseControl, PersistentSearchControl, SortControl, SortResponseControl, TreeDeleteControl, VirtualListViewControl, VirtualListViewResponseControl
public class BasicControl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Control

This class provides a basic implementation of the Control interface. It represents an LDAPv3 Control as defined in RFC-2251.

See Also:

Constructor Detail

BasicControl

public BasicControl(java.lang.String id)
Constructs a new instance of BasicControl. It is a non-critical control.
Parameters:
id - The control's object identifier string.

BasicControl

public BasicControl(java.lang.String id,
                    boolean criticality,
                    byte[] value)
Constructs a new instance of BasicControl.
Parameters:
id - The control's object identifier string.
criticality - The control's criticality.
value - The control's ASN.1 BER encoded value. May be null.
Method Detail

getEncodedValue

public byte[] getEncodedValue()
Retrieves the control's ASN.1 BER encoded value. The result is the raw BER bytes including the tag and length of the control's value. It does not include the control's object identifier string or criticality.
Specified by:
getEncodedValue in interface Control
Returns:
A possibly null byte array representing the control's ASN.1 BER encoded value.

getID

public java.lang.String getID()
Retrieves the control's object identifier string.
Specified by:
getID in interface Control
Returns:
The non-null object identifier string.

isCritical

public boolean isCritical()
Determines the control's criticality.
Specified by:
isCritical in interface Control
Returns:
true if the control is critical; false otherwise.
